remarks: The definition of the fundamental group.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Jul-2015.)
statement:
pi1val.g $e |- G = ( J pi1 Y ) $.
pi1val.1 $e |- ( ph -> J e. ( TopOn ` X ) ) $.
pi1val.2 $e |- ( ph -> Y e. X ) $.
pi1val.o $e |- O = ( J Om1 Y ) $.
pi1val $p |- ( ph -> G = ( O /s ( ~=ph ` J ) ) ) $.
